lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.view.gui.coord

Class CreateICrashCoordGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.view.gui.coord.CreateICrashCoordGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CreatedWindows

    public class CreateICrashCoordGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements CreatedWindows
    The Class MainICrashGUI that allows creation of a coordinator iCrash window.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DtCoordinatorID _aDtCoordinatorID
      The Coordinator ID that was used to create this window, it's used to work out which windows to close when a coordinator has been deleted.
      private javafx.stage.Stage stage
      The stage that the form will be held in.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CreateICrashCoordGUI(DtCoordinatorID aDtCoordinatorID, ActCoordinator aActCoordinator)
      Instantiates a new window for the coordinator to use iCrash.

      Allows the other screens to force this window to close.

      Gets the data type of the coordinator's ID.
